name: LAZERS
description:
Download the Android spin-off of LAZERS now for free !

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.wasplay.LazersReflex

LAZERS is local multiplayer 2D action game, where you need to kill all other players with LAZERS !

Play up to 4 players in every gamemode, unlock skins and customize your player's color, hours of fun in multiplayer !

Demo content :

  • 10 Weapons
  • 40 Battle levels (3 worlds)
  • Tutorial and sandbox mode
  • Classic mode with lives and points limit
  • 11 animated skins to buy in the game's shop (with the game's money that you earn by playing
